footer.text: HBS is maintained by Vriska & Rose @ramblingArachnid#8781.

fields.name: Get Emoji Usage
fields.value:
**hbs;getEmojiUsage [num] [-s | -a] **
Returns top and bottom [num] emojis (default 15). Static or animated emojis can be specified using -s or -a.

fields.name: Get Full Emoji Usage
fields.value:
**hbs;getFullEmojiUsage**
Returns all emojis in server with usage stats, sorted by most to least used.

fields.name: Spoil Images
fields.value:
**hbs;spoil [text] <image(s)>
\hbs;spoil [text] <image(s)> (to escape pk autoproxy.)**
Resends image(s) under spoiler tag, with text. Can spoil up to 10 images at once.
